reviewText: WEll it's your normal funny shows but the frist one the TAC finds out Momege likes the hot guy. The last one is very sad yet it unvails the plot of the show and tells a littel truth about the world we live in. It is very sad but the first time you watch it you many not get whats going on.
this is very simply the best anime series around. It rivals any with the same gothic violence driven humor. Also, check out TRIGUN
